attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to start a petition to axe the BBC license fee. It is a waste of money, and the BBC do absolutely nthing with it, apart from make programmes in which noone watches. The license fee should either be axed altogether, and the BBC goes private, or the Great British public have a choice on whether or not they want to pay the license fee.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
